name: Gary
text: The Blaze Pizza store in Yorba Linda used to be very good. I don‚Äôt know what has happened to it lately, but I have never had two worse pizzas in my life the last two times. The last pizza had no cheese on it and was all sauce. Bring back the old Blaze Pizza. They were so bad, I don‚Äôt think I will be back.

name: Jordan Yoshimine
text: In town visiting parents who recently moved to YL. Heard about the new Town Center and wanted dinner so stopped by to check it out.  It was Friday night at 7pm so it was really busy but they were well staffed so the line moved quickly. ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher Smith
text: Came for lunch, fast service, nice to build your own pizza. Very clean inside, busy lunch crowd.

name: Angelina
text: Create your own pizza gives you many options to choose from. Overall taste was DELICIOUS!! Customer service was awesome. Thank you Jason! I would definitely recommend and definitely go back.

name: Mariana Polic
text: The pizza is delicious. Our only issue was with service. Three times we visited they were slow and very disorganized. On our fourth (and possibly last) try, we were lucky to have Jason and Ramiro. They were pleasant, attentive, organized, and fast! We will be back, as they restored our trust. Thank you!

name: brian bonilla
text: My pizza was pretty good, but they ran out of ingredients for my girlfriends pizza.  Kinda weird.    Also, with the exception of one worker, service was kinda lousy.

name: Wayne Howren
text:
The Pizza here is good. The complete COLD environment just ruins the experience
I've been to Yorba Linda place 3 times, always freezing inside. Warmer and quieter outside. Tonite, we tried 4 different propane heaters and none would light. ‚Ä¶More

name: Joe Blow
text: I loved Blaze. They are a little slow but on point. The manager keeps things moving and finishes your pizza cooked perfect!

name: Tony Olson
text: Weekend service is a massive headache, an online order placed 4 hours prior was not started until 5 minutes before the pickup time regardless of the fact that the restaurant knows they are going to have a massive rush. Parking is impossible ‚Ä¶More

name: Sue P
text: Having your pizza prepare just the way you like is great....they do just that! Loads of meat, vegetable and cheese toppings. Ask for a little of this or more of that... they sure made us happy with our "personalized pizza". Staff there are great too! I will be back whenever I have a craving for pizza.

name: Colby Wakeman
text: The family dropped in for some pizza. Excellent service and great food!

name: Paul Reid
text: Blaze was very crowded, and slightly overcrowded. We had to wait at the front with no acknowledgement explanation while he prepared 6 web orders. Toppings were stacked in the middle and not spread out, including the salt, which made the ‚Ä¶More

name: Julian Contreras
text: Relax and cool place (during the morning) to enjoy a thin crust pizza with all the toppings you want on it. I had to go with a half pesto/garlic sauce, feta cheese, and all the veggies and on the other half with a classic Hawaiian.

name: Tyler Montano
text: It's pricy for not that well tasting pizza. Cool idea though. It's like a Subway but for pizza.

name: Sonia B
text: Build my own pizza, fresh salad, with plenty of leftovers. Friendly, organized staff were eager to please my picky taste buds and prompt with my order lol like using the deals sent to my Blaze app thank you !

name: Richard Williamson
text: Consistently good pizza made to order. I really like the build your own. Just what I want on the pizza.

name: Shirish Desai
text: Good pizza, but ran out of green bell pepper, fresh basil. No finishes were offered.

name: NIDI TEC
text: Jason the manager was extremely rude and also did not want to apologies for his behavior ‚Ä¶More

name: Julian Nam
text: Only been here twice. Might be enough. Once the pizza was burnt. Another time the ice machine was broken which meant not just lukewarm drinks but also flat soda. Yet they just kept selling drinks and not telling the customers. It was only ‚Ä¶More

name: William Phillips
text: Not bad, not great.  We like pieology better but this is close to home.  Staff is slow but seem to be new and training so cut them some slack. ‚Ä¶More

name: Felipe Martinez
text: They messed up my keto pizza but fixed it and gave me a coupon,  thank you!

name: Helen Vandal
text: I like to be able build your my own pizza.  I've visited other locations and I'm glad we're have one in Yorba Linda now.  I would've give 5 stars, but there was confusion on my order of garlic knots.  I had to ask about then a couple of ‚Ä¶More

name: Kristy Cronkrite
text: I've been to the new Blaze Pizza in Yorba Linda several times now and I'm just not impressed. Whether during the busy dinner rush or a slow weekday morning, service is beyond slow. It takes a long time to place an order, pay for an order, ‚Ä¶More

text:
I did not have a pleasant experience at this Blaze. Far from, actually.

Typically, I go to the ones in either Orange on Tustin or the Brea location that ‚Ä¶More

text: VERY disappointing.  Brought in the family to eat.  We have eaten at 2 other Blaze's in the area, and this place was NOT on par.  First, our pizza crusts were burnt.  Second, my pizza simply didn't taste good.  And third, I asked THREE ‚Ä¶More

name: Susan Peeks
text: I loved it! Clean, great smelling (it's pizza!), bright, cheerful!! Incredibly busy and totally under control. Other than being out of napkins in the recepticals not 1 thread was loose.

name: Aaron Zapata
text: Tried the gluten free pizza there tonight and it‚Äôs one of the best GF pizzas I‚Äôve had! So goo.

name: Oscar Gonzalez
text: It‚Äôs a new place so the employees are new and still learning but they have the best customer service. Pizza was in n out the oven quick. Definitely my favorite blaze pizza store.

name: Maribel Martinez
text: So happy with the keto crust! The preparing stage took too long. Would suggest to order online if you have a lunch thats 30-60 minutes long... You won't be able to enjoy the pizza in that time frame.

name: Nathan Millsap
text: It's good and has plenty of options for everyone. Though, try not to go when its busy, the pizzas tend to be under cooked if you like crispy crust.

name: Lizethe Molina
text: Quick service, good food & nice tranquil seating outside. Although they could use some napkin dispensers outside....

text: Guy Boxing the pizzas I'd very rude very slow and doesnt box them in order. He caused the store to back up.
